pageProduct.name: Olay Total Effects Whip Face Cream Moisturiser 50g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Feel a Light as Air Finish in a Flash

Delightfully Whipped

Finally, all the power of a heavy cream whipped to airy perfection. Ten years in the making, this breakthrough weightless Whip formula is light as air without compromising the potency.

Light as Air Finish

Skin is left with a smooth, matte and shine-free finish that doesn't feel sticky or greasy. The light as air finish makes this moisturiser the perfect primer to help makeup set and stay throughout the day.

Rush of Absorption

This innovative moisturizer, with Active Rush Technology, transforms from cream to liquid on contact, flash absorbing and delivering a rush of brightening ingredients and hydration that lasts all day.

What is Active Rush Technology?

Unique Structure

Whips with Active Rush Technology features a unique three-dimensional structure that delivers potent ingredients and intense hydration in an airy, weightless form. This breakthrough technology gives your skin these benefits without the frustrating tradeoffs.

Matte Moisture

The Active Rush Technology instantly leaves skin feeling light, dry and soft-not greasy or slick. This powerful technology even works throughout the day to keep skin feeling smooth and matte, helping banish that 3pm shine.

Hold and Release

Its innovative hold and release delivery system holds 1000x its weight in hydration and active ingredients. When this Whip moisturizer is applied to your skin, it instantly releases the powerful hydration and actives for immediate absorption.

General Information

Olay Total Effects Whips Face Cream Moisturiser revives dull & tired-looking skin without greasiness. Light as air texture. 8 hour shine control. Ultimate nourishment without weight.

OLAY
TOTAL EFFECTS WHIP

REVIVES DULL & TIRED-LOOKING SKIN WITHOUT GREASINESS

Light as air texture. 8 hour shine control. Ultimate nourishment without weight.

Size: 50g

Oil-Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• ACTIVE MOISTURISER
ALL-IN-ONE MOISTURISER
• Controls shine and gives matte finish, even after 8 hours
Skin feels light and smooth all day long
• Instantly hydrates and primes skin for all-day makeup wear. Light as air texture. 8 hour shine control. Ultimate nourishment without weight.
• TECHNOLOGY
• Exclusive Active Rush Technology actively holds & releases 1000X its weight in hydration
• • Uniquely whipped formula, enriched with vitamins (B3, Pro-B5, E) and anti-oxidants (Green tea, BHT)
• Oil-Free. Non-Greasy. Absorbs instantly. Will not clog pores.
• FIGHTS 7 SKIN ISSUES
1. Nourishing hydration to revive dull and tired-looking skin
2. Smoothes uneven skin texture
3. Brightens and balances uneven skin tone
• 4. Visibly smoothes fine lines and wrinkles
5. Minimizes the look of pores
6. Restores firm feeling
7. Visibly reduces dark spots

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water.

CAUTION

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Do not discard outer carton.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Tapioca Starch, Isohexadecane, Isopropyl Isostearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Cetyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Behenyl Alcohol, Sodium Polyacrylate Starch, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Dimethiconol, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, BHT, Disodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract

Directions

Smooth evenly over your cleansed face and neck morning and evening.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
